hooks.command: if [ -f .prettierrc ] || [ -f .prettierrc.json ] || [ -f .prettierrc.js ] || [ -f prettier.config.js ] || [ -f prettier.config.mjs ] || [ -f prettier.config.cjs ]; then npx prettier --write "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null; elif [ -f biome.json ] || [ -f biome.jsonc ]; then npx @biomejs/biome format --write "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null; elif [ -f .eslintrc ] || [ -f .eslintrc.json ] || [ -f .eslintrc.js ] || [ -f eslint.config.js ] || [ -f eslint.config.mjs ] || [ -f eslint.config.cjs ]; then npx eslint --fix "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null; fi; true
